title: 820-3437-B BIOS crashing
message:
Hello everybody

I m working on 820-3437-B some one worked on it. When come to my desk fan spinning but not chime not mouse led... after rewrite BOIS board turned on for 3-5 time ( screen come back and mouse led on) after few reboot stopped again and turned at start problem . Replaced  bios chip 3 time and all the time same issue. ( SMC looking like replaced i cant be sure is it correct SMC). 

Any suggestion for solve problem?

title: 820-3437-B BIOS crashing
message: Where did you get the bios file??? It has a clean ME region???

title: 820-3437-B BIOS crashing
message: I hope you still have the original backup!?

title: 820-3437-B BIOS crashing
message: I have clean me file known good also used before this board and worked without problem. Yes i have original bios file backup.

title: 820-3437-B BIOS crashing
message: Something else is reacting to the heat. Put back original file and check all SPI termination resistors. Look for corrosion around U6100 area and pin 8 of U1950.
